title: Client participants: Admin measures
description: Measures collected before the start of the study for client participants. These measures are gathered for administrative description of the study and some are dynamically updated, such as current_study_status.

custom.jcoin:missingValuesDescription:
**Below are extended descriptions of each `missingValues` (ie reserve code):**

  - Don't know: This code indicates that the respondent did not have the knowledge or information required to answer the question.
  - Not collected: This code indicates that the data for the question was not collected or recorded by the survey administrator or interviewer.
  - Missing in error: This code signifies that the data for the question is missing without any clear reason or explanation.

fields.name: hub_id
fields.title: Hub identifier
fields.description: Randomly-generated integer for each unique hub.

fields.name: quarter_enrolled
fields.title: Quarter Enrolled
fields.description: The financial quarter and year of enrollment

fields.name: state_of_site_enrollment
fields.title: State of Site For Enrollment
fields.description: The U.S. State abbreviation of the site where client (participant) was initially enrolled

fields.name: current_study_status
fields.title: Current Study Status
fields.description:
A summary of the current status where client (participant) is in
study.

custom.jcoin:note: Re-incarcerated" = re-incarceration leading to dropout or withdrawal and "Withdrawn by investigator" = withdrawal by investigator for other reasons not listed

fields.name: days_on_study
fields.title: Days on study
fields.description:
The number of total days (anchor date is baseline visit date) on study as calculated by:

1. the date data was last updated minus the baseline visit date, if on study
2. the date of attrition minus the baseline visit date, if attrited
3. the date of study completion minus the baseline visit date, if complete study

NOTE: again, the baseline date is the anchor date.
